sentences.en: a neglected garden
sentences.cn: 疏于打理的花园

sentences.en: Don't neglect to lock the door when you leave.
sentences.cn: 你离开时别忘了锁门.

sentences.en: Feed plants and they grow, neglect them and they suffer.
sentences.cn: 人勤地生宝；人懒地长草。

sentences.en: He railed at the world for its neglect of his genius.
sentences.cn: 他怨世人不能赏识他的才华.

sentences.en: If you are not careful, children tend to neglect their homework.
sentences.cn: 如果你不注意的话，孩子们往往会不重视他们的家庭作业。

sentences.en: Many of these ideas have been neglected by modern historians.
sentences.cn: 这些观点有许多都被现代的历史学家忽略了。

sentences.en: Niwano's business began to suffer from neglect.
sentences.cn: 尼瓦诺的生意因为疏于管理而开始出现问题.

sentences.en: One must not think only of the present and neglect the future.
sentences.cn: 不能只顾眼前,不管将来.

sentences.en: She smoked and drank, neglected the children, and left the clothes unmended.
sentences.cn: 她抽烟喝酒，既不照顾孩子，也不缝补衣服。

sentences.en: Tenants are complaining about the landlord’s neglect of the property.
sentences.cn: 住户在抱怨房东疏忽了房屋的维修。

sentences.en: The boss fired him out for neglect of his duty.
sentences.cn: 老板以玩忽职守为由把他开除了.

sentences.en: The building had a general air of decrepitude and neglect.
sentences.cn: 这座建筑看上去破旧失修，无人照管。

sentences.en: The building has been badly neglected.
sentences.cn: 这栋大楼严重疏于维护。

sentences.en: The fire was entirely caused by their neglect of duty.
sentences.cn: 那场火灾完全是由于他们失职而引起的.

sentences.en: The police officer was accused of neglecting his duty (= not doing everything he should ).
sentences.cn: 那位警官被控渎职。

sentences.en: The town's old quayside is collapsing after years of neglect.
sentences.cn: 镇上老码头区多年来疏于维护,快要塌陷了.

sentences.en: They neglect their duty at the least hint of fun elsewhere.
sentences.cn: 别处哪怕发生一丁点儿乐事，他们便会忘记自己的职责。

sentences.en: They never neglect their duties.
sentences.cn: 他们从未玩忽职守。

sentences.en: Today's housing problems are the product of years of neglect.
sentences.cn: 今天的住房困难是多年来忽视的结果.

sentences.en: We often neglect to make proper use of our bodies.
sentences.cn: 我们经常忘记该合理地使用我们的身体。

sentences.en: Wilful neglect of our manufacturing industry has caused this problem.
sentences.cn: 故意忽略我们的制造业引起了这个问题。

words.tran_cn: 被忽视的；未被好好照管的
疏忽的；忽略的；不小心的
微不足道的，可以忽略的

phrases.tran_cn: 玩忽职守；[法]失职；过失责任

trans.tran_en: failure to look after something or someone, or the condition of not being looked after

trans.tran_cn: 忽视， 忽略； 疏忽
trans.tran_en: to pay too little attention to something
to fail to look after someone or something properly
to pay too little attention to something

trans.tran_cn: 忽视； 疏忽， 忽略；漏做
trans.tran_en: to pay too little attention to something
to fail to look after someone or something properly
